statements: SELECT id, user_id, content_name, creation_date, status, notes FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs;
SELECT * FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT content_name, status FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, user_id, status FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, content_name, creation_date FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT id, content_name, status, creation_date FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs WHERE user_id=5 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, content_name, notes FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND status='Cancelled';
SELECT user_id, content_name, status FROM AR_Content_Creation_Logs WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM ar_content_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, content_name FROM ar_content_details WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT content_id, content_name, creation_date FROM ar_content_details ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, log_timestamp FROM ar_content_logs WHERE action = 'View' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(content_size) AS average_size FROM ar_content_details;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, user_id, content_id, action FROM ar_content_logs;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type, content_size, creation_date FROM ar_content_details;
SELECT log_timestamp, user_id, content_id, action, log_id FROM ar_content_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT content_id, content_name FROM ar_content_details WHERE content_type = 'document' AND creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_size FROM ar_content_details WHERE content_type = 'video' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ARContentLogs;
SELECT project_id, action, timestamp FROM ARContentLogs WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM ARContentProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM ARContentUsers WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM ARContentUsers ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ARContentLogs;
SELECT log_id, project_id, timestamp FROM ARContentLogs WHERE action = 'view';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ARContentProjects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT username, email FROM ARContentUsers WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT project_id, timestamp FROM ARContentLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_logs;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM ar_content_logs WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT content_name, creation_date FROM ar_content WHERE created_by=456 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM ar_users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT content_id, asset_type, asset_url FROM ar_content_assets WHERE content_id=789 AND asset_type='image';

SELECT content_name, creation_date FROM ar_content WHERE created_by = 123 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' AND asset_url LIKE '%.png';
SELECT content_id, action, timestamp FROM ar_content_logs WHERE content_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_logs ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM ar_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT category_name FROM content_categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT developer_name, join_date FROM developers WHERE specialization = 'Web Development';
SELECT log_id, log_details FROM ar_content_logs WHERE creator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_logs WHERE creator_id = 1 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT content_name, content_description FROM ar_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT developer_name, specialization FROM developers WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT category_name FROM content_categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT log_id, event_date FROM content_logs_history ORDER BY event_date ASC, log_id DESC;
